Override added on 02/05/01 by : Reason for override : monitor NORTRIPTYLINE ( NORTRIPTYLINE HCL ) 25 MG PO HS DIET : No Restrictions Activity - As tolerated RETURN TO WORK : Your oncologist , No Known Allergies HTN NIDDM-DIET TL TONSILECT ATYPICAL CP OPERATIONS AND PROCEDURES : OTHER TREATMENTS / PROCEDURES ( NOT IN O.R. ) None BRIEF RESUME OF HOSPITAL COURSE : 50 year old woman with metastatic breast CA with mets to lung and liver , with several days of light chest pressure , and also c/o puffiness in face . Got chest CT which ruled out SVC syndrome . Pt r/o for MI . Her symptoms most likely 2nd to large pleural effusion that will be addressed as outpatient as per outpatient attending . As we have an explanation for DOE , we though that w/u for PE not necessary . ADDITIONAL COMMENTS : If you have chest pain , diaphoresis , nausea / vomiting , please return to emergency room .
